hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to sacrifice two horned, black-and-white rams and he would say the Name of Allah and pronounce His greatness. I saw him slaughtering them with his own hand, putting his foot on their sides.”

chapter.ara-name: باب أَضَاحِيِّ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The sacrifices of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)
